Smart Lawn Mower: Develop a lawn mower that uses sensors and artificial intelligence to navigate and cut the grass. The mower would learn the layout of the lawn and adjust its path to optimize grass cutting, reducing waste and ensuring a neat finish.

Electric Lawn Mower: Create an electric lawn mower that uses rechargeable batteries to power the blades. This would be more environmentally friendly than traditional gas-powered lawn mowers, reducing emissions and noise pollution.

Lawn Mower with Self-Cleaning Brushes: Develop a lawn mower with self-cleaning brushes that automatically remove dirt and debris from the blades. This would save time and effort for the user, as they wouldn't have to manually clean the mower after each use.

Lawn Mower with Adjustable Height: Create a lawn mower with an adjustable height setting that allows the user to customize the length of the grass. This would be useful for people who prefer different heights of grass for different areas of their lawn.
Lawn Mower with GPS Navigation: Develop a lawn mower with GPS navigation that allows the user to set the mower to follow a specific path
